response.explain: The previous action was successful and the robot now has the tray in its inventory. The next step is to move the robot to the fridge and open it to access the bacon.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the bacon from the fridge.
(4) Put the bacon on the tray.
(5) Cook the bacon.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    fridge = registry(env,"fridge_xyejdx_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, fridge, camera)
    donothing(env)
    open(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
